answers.answer: Pre-*** is normal, but if you mean that he isn't getting aroused to the point of ejaculation, that's another thing.Some men "can't" reach orgasm because of medical issues and some because of mental issues.Physical reasons include diabetes and erectile dysfunction. Mental reasons could include: fear of getting partner pregnant, fear of not being able to perform properly.

question: why do my man just precum,every time we make love?
title: precum
